Class InputParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • InputParser

  • class InputParser
extends java.lang.Object
    InputParser parses text input and returns a set of equations, functions, and a goal

      • parseFunction

        private static Function parseFunction(java.lang.String line)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Takes a string as input and constructs a Function object from this input
        Parameters:
        line - the input string
        Returns:
        A Function object based on the contents of the input string
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if line is null or is missing information
        See Also:
        Function

      • parseEquation

        private static Equation parseEquation(java.util.Set<Function> functions,
                                      java.lang.String line)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Takes a string and a set of functions as input and constructs an Equation object from this input
        Parameters:
        functions - A set of functions that are necessary to recognize function symbols in the input string
        line - The input string
        Returns:
        An Equation object based on the contents of the input string and functions
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if functions is empty or null, line is null, line contains less or more than one "=", or line is empty left or right of "="
        See Also:
        Equation, Function
